title: Ba La La Xiao Mo Xian Zhi: Feiyue Cai Ling Bao
synopsis: Not far from the Magical World of Fairy Castle, there is another Magical Kingdom called Colorful Castle. Which is a place full of color, joy and humor, just like a peaceful, carefree paradise... Until one day, at the edge of the Kingdom, There a dark gray island, where the owner of it, The Lord of black curse just woke up from sleep. In order to make his island to become more powerful, he decide to steal the "Color Magic Energy" of Colorful Castle for himself.
related_anime: ['Ba La La Xiao Mo Xian Zhi: Feiyue Cai Ling Bao 2nd Season', 'Ba La La Xiao Mo Xian Zhi: Meng Huan Xuan Lu']
